Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GrnAI is very good at improving my writing. Sometimes I know what I have written is phrased incorrectly. GenAI will let me know exactly why.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I actually feel more comfortable getting feedback from genAI.....

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI has the time to give me more complex feedback.  Uni lecturers and supervisors are way too time poor and overworked.
